Yes, please sign me up to receive The Daily Juice Privacy Policy send Tom Schwartz Tells All On Divorce After Explosive Fight With Katie Maloney The ‘Vanderpump Rules’ star admits separating is ‘not that sad at all!’ Posted on Feb 23, 2017 @ 11:47AM 
Tom Schwartz and Katie Maloney ’s marriage may be over before their wedding airs on Vanderpump Rules , RadarOnline.com has learned! 
Schwartz, 34, revealed to The Daily Dish that Scheana and Mike Shay ’s divorce has changed the way he views marriage , saying: “It’s sobering for sure. It’s unfortunate, but [Tom Sandoval and I] were chatting earlier. I still think, even if things don’t work out and you end up getting divorced or you break up with someone, there’s still so many good things that [came out of the relationship].” 
PHOTOS: ‘Vanderpump Rules’ Star Scheana Shay Sizzles In Her Bikini 
“People are so bleak about it,” he added. “I get it. Initially the knee-jerk reaction, you know, you’re very negative, ‘I wasted four years,’ but really, there’s so much to it. It’s so rich. It’s not that sad to me when people get divorced. It’s not that sad at all.” 
Schwartz and Maloney, 30, began dating before Vanderpump Rules premiered in 2013. The show has chronicled their extensive relationship problems — including disturbing cheating rumors.
